stepAnswer: SELECT * FROM Customer LEFT JOIN CustomerDetail ON Customer.Id $$=$$ CustomerDetail.CustomerId;
stepTitle: This statement will return a row for every row in the Customer table, and also associated information from the CustomerDetail table if there is any.
